content:
GUI clipboard and polling features implemented:
- Side panels (FEED/QUERY/DEBUG) copy to clipboard on click via xclip
- Carousel nodes copy content to clipboard when collapsing
- Auto-polling every 3 seconds sends status/receipts to populate QUERY/DEBUG panels
- DREAM button spawns UHMA in live mode (batch OFF)
- FEED menu spawns UHMA in feed mode (batch ON)
- Fixed stack alignment crash in start_collapse_anim
GUI clipboard copy uses xclip via system() - writes to /tmp/uhma_clip.txt then pipes to xclip -selection clipboard
QUERY and DEBUG TCP channels are request/response only - need explicit polling to populate panels in autonomous mode
Stack alignment in start_collapse_anim: must align before calling copy_ring_to_clipboard - 2 pushes (even) needs sub rsp,8 to align
poll_channels() sends status to QUERY and receipts 5 to DEBUG every POLL_INTERVAL (180) frames (~3 sec at 60fps)
